title: Saracens fall to Champions Cup defeat by Sharks
subtitle: Saracens' ill-discipline proves costly as they fall to a 28-23 Investec Champions Cup defeat by the Sharks in torrential rain in Durban.
full_text: Saracens' ill-discipline proves costly as they fall to a 28-23 Investec Champions Cup defeat by the Sharks in torrential rain in Durban.
